BackstoryDef.title: deserter
BackstoryDef.description: On garrison duty, [PAWN_nameDef] grew bold with petty theft, breaking locks and stripping valuables from civilian homes. Neighbors whispered, and soon entire blocks were missing heirlooms. When command finally noticed, [PAWN_pronoun] took [PAWN_possessive] rifle and armor and deserted before the MPs arrived.

During raids, [PAWN_nameDef] was known to linger behind the line, searching homes for trinkets while others fought. The habit grew until comrades reported whole bags of loot tucked under [PAWN_possessive] bunk. Faced with certain punishment, [PAWN_pronoun] fled in the night and never returned.

After ambushes, [PAWN_nameDef] scavenged corpses without distinction, stripping allies and enemies alike of weapons, armor, and credits. What began as quiet profiteering turned into open desecration of the dead. Before the court-martial could convene, [PAWN_pronoun] deserted and disappeared into the enclave.

Assigned to protect supply caravans, [PAWN_nameDef] instead set up roadside shakedowns, demanding bribes from merchants for safe passage. The scheme grew bold enough to disrupt entire convoys. When word reached command, [PAWN_pronoun] slipped away before the MPs could bring charges.

On patrol duty, [PAWN_nameDef] made a habit of threatening civilians with live fire to enforce discipline. One incident escalated, and [PAWN_pronoun] gunned down unarmed villagers in full view of witnesses. Knowing the tribunal was inevitable, [PAWN_pronoun] deserted and vanished into pirate ranks.

In garrison towns, [PAWN_nameDef] prowled alleys and markets, extorting locals for protection money. Knives at throats, boots at doors — [PAWN_possessive] racket spread fear until even NORD officers caught wind. Faced with certain charges, [PAWN_pronoun] slipped into the night and never came back.

On campaign, [PAWN_nameDef] helped run a black-market stall hidden behind the supply tents. Stolen rations and gear were sold in bulk, shared among a handful of deserters-to-be. Once NORD officers traced the shortages to the ring, [PAWN_pronoun] deserted rather than stand trial.

[PAWN_nameDef] fell in with a circle of troopers who raided villages during night patrols. They moved as a pack, breaking into homes and dividing spoils before dawn. When one of the victims reported the gang, arrests began — and [PAWN_pronoun] deserted before the noose tightened.
